title: The Most Dangerous Game of Chicken Ever Played | Guests: AG Eric Schmitt & Kathryn Limbaugh | 10/25/22
description:
Things are escalating, as President Biden puts feet on the ground in Romania and Russia is making its own questionable moves. Glenn lays out the facts and predicts the dangers that could be coming. Glenn and Stu review the absurdly biased coverage from the New York Times on the latest Florida gubernatorial debate. Missouri AG and Senate candidate Eric Schmitt joins to discuss the investigations he’s leading into the six largest banks and Dr. Fauci. Senate candidate General Dan Bolduc joins to share where he stands in his race and discusses the worsening crisis involving Russia and Ukraine. Kathryn Limbaugh, co-author of “Radio’s Greatest of All Time” and wife of the late Rush Limbaugh, joins to share her husband's legacy and his impact on conservative radio.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
